/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Power lines crisscross above, forming an intricate web against the sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city.

A black car is parked on the side of the road, its sleek form contrasting with the rough texture of the asphalt. A white van is captured in motion, driving down the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene.

The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens used, giving it a unique, almost surreal quality. Despite this distortion, the image faithfully captures the essence of a day in the life of this vibrant city.
